title: How I made £1m: 'I started my online business after my tights fell down in the street'
text:
This Telegraph Money series looks at how ordinary people made their fortune and how others can follow in their footsteps. It will be published on Mondays at 6am. You can read last week's article here.

How do entrepreneurs get their business ideas? For some, it takes months of fastidious research while for others a casual conversation can be all that is needed to generate a winning idea.

For Brie Read, the founder of Snag, the inspiration for setting up a business selling tights online came from an unfortunate incident a couple of years ago.

“I was walking down a busy street and my tights fell down,” she said. “I had to take my shoes off to take my tights off and it was super embarrassing.”...
